extension.news: [B][COLOR red]Update - v6.0.7 - July 18, 2021[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Trakt Manager's [B]"Hide Item"[/B] now allows you to hide from both [B]"Watched Progress"[/B] and [B]"Calendar"[/B] in one click. There is now a new third option added for this.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] The new [B]Trakt Manager Tools[/B] options for [B]Unfinished Movies Progress Manager[/B] and [B]Unfinished Episode Progress Manager[/B] is now available in the [B]Trakt Manager[/B] when viewing these [B]Unfinished[/B] lists.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] [B]"My TVShows - Progress"[/B] will now bring any newly aired season-episode1 items to the top of the list for a period of 7 days after it's air date. A perfect example when this comes in handy is for a show like [B]"Dexter"[/B]. When Season9-Episode1 airs in November this item for me will be on the bottom since it was last watched years ago. Now a newly aired season will get placed to the top for ease of access for 7 days.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Receiving some reports of non loading menu lists in v6.0.6 update. That version update had a hard coded clearing of cache and metacache. It seems that for some this process did not occur and results in this non loading of menus. The new [B]"Trakt Management Tools"[/B] required a metacache change. Please manually clear cache and metacache if you are experiencing this issue.[/I]
